verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* custom \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w act|strong="H6213"\w* according \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* manner \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan, \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* walk \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H2708"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* precepts, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* walk \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* laws \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* live \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* kin \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*: \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H0176"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \w whether|strong="H0176"\w* \w born|strong="H4138"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* thy \w daughter’s|strong="H1323"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* thy own \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w wife’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, whom \w she|strong="H1931"\w* bore \w to|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* thy \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*: because \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w flesh|strong="H7607"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H0269"\w* thy \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* thy \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w flesh|strong="H7607"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H7126"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w joined|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w by|strong="H0413"\w* affinity.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy daughter \w in|strong="H0802"\w* law: because \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* thy \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou discover \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w shame|strong="H6172"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* thy \w brother’s|strong="H0251"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: because \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w daughter’s|strong="H1323"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* discover \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w shame|strong="H6172"\w*: because \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* flesh, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w such|strong="H1931"\w* copulation \w is|strong="H1931"\w* incest.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w wife’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* harlot, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* rival \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou discover \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*, \w while|strong="H5921"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H0802"\w* \w yet|strong="H5921"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H7126"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w having|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* flowers, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* lie \w with|strong="H0413"\w* thy neighbour’s \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* mingling \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* consecrated \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* idol Moloch, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w defile|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* mankind \w as|strong="H2145"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* womankind, because \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* copulate \w with|strong="H0802"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w with|strong="H0802"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*. \w A|strong="H5414"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* lie \w down|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* copulate \w with|strong="H0802"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*: \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* heinous crime.

\w Defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H2930"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H2930"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* which \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* abominations \w of|strong="H0776"\w* which \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w*, \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w vomit|strong="H6958"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* ye \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* own nation, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* sojourneth \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0411"\w* \w detestable|strong="H8441"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* inhabitants \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w*; \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

Beware \w then|strong="H0853"\w*, lest \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* manner, \w it|strong="H2930"\w* \w vomit|strong="H6958"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w*, \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* do \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H2930"\w* vomited \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* commit \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*, \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* commandments. \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w things|strong="H8441"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H2930"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* therein. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
